thread.title: Pistons owner Gores seeks 'major corporation' to move to Flint, report says
thread.title_full: Pistons owner Gores seeks 'major corporation' to move to Flint, report says

author: Ron Fonger | rfonger1@mlive.com
title: Pistons owner Gores seeks 'major corporation' to move to Flint, report says
text: FLINT, MI -- Detroit Pistons owner Tom Gores wants to help relocate a company in Flint, according to a report published Tuesday, Feb. 28, by Crain's Detroit Business. "What I would like to do in Flint is find one...
